title: LF Tier 3-4 Clash Team  (Silver Sup/Top Main)
body: As said in title, Im looking to join a team for clash this weekend. Preferably a team playing mainly for fun. Happy to do any role but Support and Top are my preferred. IGN: Arctic Envy
